scripts.check: oxlint . --deny-warnings -D correctness -D suspicious -D perf -A react-in-jsx-scope -A jsx-a11y/click-events-have-key-events -A jsx-a11y/no-static-element-interactions -A unicorn/consistent-function-scoping -A jest/expect-expect -A jsx-a11y/no-autofocus -A unicorn/no-array-sort -A oxc/no-map-spread -A @typescript-eslint/no-extraneous-class -A no-unused-vars -A react/no-array-index-key -A jest/no-conditional-expect -A unicorn/prefer-set-has -A no-await-in-loop -A @typescript-eslint/no-confusing-non-null-assertion -A unicorn/no-empty-file --react-plugin --vue-plugin --vitest-plugin --jsx-a11y-plugin --promise-plugin && biome check .
scripts.lint: oxlint . --fix -D correctness -D suspicious -D perf -A react-in-jsx-scope -A jsx-a11y/click-events-have-key-events -A jsx-a11y/no-static-element-interactions -A unicorn/consistent-function-scoping -A jest/expect-expect -A jsx-a11y/no-autofocus -A unicorn/no-array-sort -A oxc/no-map-spread -A @typescript-eslint/no-extraneous-class -A no-unused-vars -A react/no-array-index-key -A jest/no-conditional-expect -A unicorn/prefer-set-has -A no-await-in-loop -A @typescript-eslint/no-confusing-non-null-assertion -A unicorn/no-empty-file --react-plugin --vue-plugin --vitest-plugin --jsx-a11y-plugin --promise-plugin
